full_text: Form FS-510 (English) (4-63) Page 2 21. I am submitting the following personal documents in support of and as part of my application Birth certificate Affida Military record Promise of employment Police certificate(s) Evidence of support or own resources Medical record(s) AS REQUESTED BY CONSULATE Other (describe) HUSBAND'S STATEMENT 22. Name and present residence of my wife/husband is (Give maiden name of wife) ROY ALFORD LEVOI, 5475 WESTMINSTER AVENUE N. , PENTHOUSE "C", , MONTREAL 29, P. Q. CANADA. 23. The names and addresses of my children under 21 years of age are NIL 24. The names of members of my family who are immigrating with me are MY HUSBAND: ROY ALFORD LEVOI 25. The name and address of my father is (If deceased, so state, giving date) ALFRED ERNEST PETERSON (DECEASED 1910) 26. The maiden name and address of my mother is (If deceased, so state, giving date) FANNY EMMILINE KLEYN (DECEASED 1934) 27. The name and address of my next of kin in my home country is 28. Since my sixteenth birthday my places of residence for 6 months or more have been City or town Province Country Dates (From-To) Calling or occupation PLEASE SEE ATTACHED SCHEDULE 29. Since my sixteenth birthday I am or have been a member or affiliate of the following political, professional, vocational or social organizations Type of membership and Name and address Dates (From-To) office held, if any NONE 30. I speak, read, write the following languages (Include your native language) Language Speak Read Write ENGLISH YES YES YES 31. I have previously been in the United States during the following periods (Give year and type of visa or status) (If never, so state) CCASIONAL SHORT TRIPS ACCOMPANYING MY HUSBAND.
